title: Love Thy Enemy
alternative_title: 원수를 사랑하라 (꽃니랑); Love Thy Enemy ;Nanji no Teki wo Aiseyo
status: 원수를 사랑하라 (꽃니랑); Love Thy Enemy ;Nanji no Teki wo Aiseyo
description:
Description :
        Read manga Love Thy Enemy"You were the most worthy opponent I had Farewell, Beatrice."Sierratica Tiar Yerphinen, my sworn enemy.I died by his sword until I didn't?!Beatrice Shelle Marcean wakes up five years after the day of her death in a new kingdoma new body, in a new family. She has gone from duchess to princessand the man from her past, Sierratica Yerphinen, barges into her land to offer a treaty. He is now an emperor, seeking a bride from her new bloodline! Now living as princess Shroina, our female lead must do whatever it takes to push away from his pull. She won't repeat the same mistake twice.
